content.rendered:
Directed by Apoorv Singh Karki. Divyanshu Malhotra

Written by Kunal Aneja. Jasdeep Singh. Puneet Batra. Deepesh Sumitra Jagdish

Cast Ritvik Sahore( Rajat / …15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Tanya Maniktala( Ishita15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Sunakshi Grover( Anusha15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Shivam Kakar( Gaurav Pandey / …15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Deepesh Sumitra Jagdish( Pradeep Kaushal / …15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Sachin Vidrohi( Vishank8 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Neelu Dogra( Rajat’s Mother7 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Sahil Verma( Walia Sir6 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Purnendu Bhattacharya( Rajat’s Father5 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Raj Sharma( Ishita’s Father5 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Farabi Md Refat( Satendr5 episodes, 2019 ). Gaurav Manwani( Batri5 episodes, 2022 ). Kunal Aneja( Momo Seller / …4 episodes, 2018-2019 ). Sachin Kathuria( Khanna Ji / …4 episodes, 2019 ). Vikhyat Gulati( Nikhil4 episodes, 2022 ). Anushka Kaushik( Jaskirath2 episodes, 2019 ). Simar Singh Oberoi( Student2 episodes, 2019 ). Ujjawal Aggarwal( Student2 episodes, 2019 ). Gaurav Devagan( Ankush Bhaiya2 episodes, 2022 ). Lalit Shokeen( Jaanu Shokeen1 episode, 2018 ). Manan Madaan( Ramit1 episode, 2019 ). Devika Majumdar( RT Purifier Girl1 episode, 2019 ). Apoorv Singh Karki( Anand Sir1 episode, 2019 ). Harpreet Kaur(1 episode, 2018 ). Lokendra Singh Rajpurohit( Rocky1 episode, 2019 ). Haneet Singh Sawhney( Random Guy 1 Beating1 episode, 2019 ). Prabhjot Singh( Buffed up Guy1 episode, 2019 ). Aakash Tyagi( Random Guy 2 Beating1 episode, 2019 ). Nikki Narulaa( Radha1 episode, 2022 )

Language Hindi

Producers Arunabh Kumar. Akansh Gaur. Arun Kumar. Puneet Waddan. Mohammad Sabir Ali. Sameer Saxena. Akshit Grover. Vijay Koshy. Shreyansh Pandey. Himali Shah. Shivani Sinha

Production Contagious Online Media Network. The Timeliners. The Viral Fever.

Season 3

Episodes 5
